title: Bicycle Repair | Student Centers | University of Illinois at Chicago
contents: Skip to the content of this page ,  the main menu , the secondary menu , the site search form , the site home page .           Student Centers     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Student Centers      Student Centers   Main Menu    About Us           Contact Us    Hours & Locations    Policies    Staff Directory         Services           Lockers    Bicycle Repair         Dining           Student Center East    Student Center West    Student Services Building    Alternate Campus Dining         Reservations    Bookstore    Bowling & Billiards           Hours    Rates and Reservations    Specials          Eyebrow menu    Policies    Sustainability    UIC Connection    Student Affairs    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search               View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Student Centers    Services    Bicycle Repair        Bicycle Repair  Student Centers provide students, staff and visitors with an opportunity to use bike fix-it stations, rent bicycle repair tools and/or a bicycle air pumps on campus. The fix-it stations are available for use at anytime. There are no restrictions on who can rent the pump or bike repair kit, however a valid identification (icard*, Driver’s License, or State ID) must be presented upon rental. The ID will be returned to the renter when the repair tools are checked and returned to the Building Manager. Below are the locations and services in Student Centers. For further information regarding bike repairs, bike amenities and benefits of biking, please visit the Office of Sustainability webpage.       SCE, Student Center East   Service Location SCE, Student Center East 750 S. Halsted Street,312-413-5100 1st floor Building Manager’s service window  Two Fix-It Stations SCE, outside, left side of front entrance from Halsted Street side (has a built in bicycle pump)  SCE, outside, left side of front entrance from campus side  Services Provided Portable Air Pump Bike Repair Tool Kit Rags/Towels available for clean-up  Note: In order to rent the bike tool kit or portable air pump, student or staff must leave icard or DL/State ID with the Building Manager.       SCW, Student Center West   Service Location 828 S. Wolcott Avenue, 312-413-5200 1st floor Building Manager’s service window  Services Provided Portable Air Pump Bike Repair Tool Kit  Note: In order to rent the bike tool kit or portable air pump, student or staff must leave icard or DL/State ID with the Building Manager.       SRF, Student Recreation Facility   Service Location 737 S. Halsted Street, 312-413-5150 1st floor equipment desk, (must swipe icard to gain entrance to building for fee paying members and current students)  Services Provided Bike Repair Tool Kit  Note: SRF only accepts icard or Visitor icard to rent the repair kit.          Services           Lockers    Bicycle Repair
